verses.verse: In the beginning <WH7225> 'Elohim <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH8804> <WH853> the heaven <WH8064> and <WH853> the earth <WH776>.

And the earth <WH776> was <WH1961> <WH8804> without form <WH8414>, and void <WH922>; and darkness <WH2822> was upon the face <WH6440> of the deep <WH8415>. And the Spirit <WH7307> of 'Elohim <WH430> moved <WH7363> <WH8764> upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the waters <WH4325>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let there be <WH1961> <WH8799> light <WH216>: and there was light <WH216>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> <WH853> the light <WH216>, that <WH3588> it was good <WH2896>: and 'Elohim <WH430> divided <WH914> <WH8686> <WH996> the light <WH216> from <WH996> the darkness <WH2822>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the light <WH216> Day <WH3117>, and the darkness <WH2822> he called <WH7121> <WH8804> Night <WH3915>. And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were the first <WH259> day <WH3117>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let there be a firmament <WH7549> in the midst <WH8432> of the waters <WH4325>, and let it divide <WH914> <WH8688> the waters <WH4325> from the waters <WH4325>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH8799> the firmament <WH7549>, and divided <WH914> <WH8686> the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were under <WH8478> the firmament <WH7549> from the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were above <WH5921> the firmament <WH7549>: and it was so <WH3651>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the firmament <WH7549> Heaven <WH8064>. And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were the second <WH8145> day <WH3117>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let the waters <WH4325> under the heaven <WH8064> be gathered together <WH6960> <WH8735> unto <WH413> one <WH259> place <WH4725>, and let the dry <WH3004> land appear <WH7200> <WH8735>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <WH430> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the dry <WH3004> land Earth <WH776>; and the gathering together <WH4723> of the waters <WH4325> called <WH7121> <WH8804> he Seas <WH3220>: and 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that it was good <WH2896>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let the earth <WH776> bring forth <WH1876> <WH8686> grass <WH1877>, the herb <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> <WH8688> seed <WH2233>, and the fruit <WH6529> tree <WH6086> yielding <WH6213> <WH8802> fruit <WH6529> after his kind <WH4327>, whose <WH834> seed <WH2233> is in itself, upon the earth <WH776>: and it was so.

And the earth <WH776> brought forth <WH3318> <WH8686> grass <WH1877>, and herb <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> <WH8688> seed <WH2233> after his kind <WH4327>, and the tree <WH6086> yielding <WH6213> <WH8802> fruit <WH6529>, whose seed <WH2233> was in itself, after his kind <WH4327>: and 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that it was good <WH2896>.
And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let there be lights <WH3974> in the firmament <WH7549> of the heaven <WH8064> to divide <WH914> <WH8687> the day <WH3117> from the night <WH3915>; and let them be for signs <WH226>, and for seasons <WH4150>, and for days <WH3117>, and years <WH8141>:
And let them be for lights <WH3974> in the firmament <WH7549> of the heaven <WH8064> to give light <WH215> <WH8687> upon the earth <WH776>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH8799> two <WH8147> great <WH1419> lights <WH3974>; the greater <WH1419> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the day <WH3117>, and the lesser <WH6996> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the night <WH3915>: he made the stars <WH3556> also.
And 'Elohim <WH430> set <WH5414> <WH8799> them in the firmament <WH7549> of the heaven <WH8064> to give light <WH215> <WH8687> upon the earth <WH776>,

And to rule <WH4910> <WH8800> over the day <WH3117> and over the night <WH3915>, and to divide <WH914> <WH8687> the light <WH216> from the darkness <WH2822>: and 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that it was good <WH2896>.
And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were the fourth <WH7243> day <WH3117>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let the waters <WH4325> bring forth abundantly <WH8317> <WH8799> the moving creature <WH8318> that hath <WH5315> life <WH2416>, and fowl <WH5775> that may fly <WH5774> <WH8787> above <WH5921> the earth <WH776> in the open <WH6440> firmament <WH7549> of heaven <WH8064>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH8799> great <WH1419> whales <WH8577>, and every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that moveth <WH7430> <WH8802>, which the waters <WH4325> brought forth abundantly <WH8317> <WH8804>, after their kind <WH4327>, and every winged <WH3671> fowl <WH5775> after his kind <WH4327>: and 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that it was good <WH2896>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Be fruitful <WH6509> <WH8798>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8798>, and fill <WH4390> <WH8798> the waters <WH4325> in the seas <WH3220>, and let fowl <WH5775> multiply <WH7235> <WH8799> in the earth <WH776>.
And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were the fifth <WH2549> day <WH3117>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let the earth <WH776> bring forth <WH3318> <WH8686> the living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> after his kind <WH4327>, cattle <WH929>, and creeping thing <WH7431>, and beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> after his kind <WH4327>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH8799> the beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> after his kind <WH4327>, and cattle <WH929> after their kind <WH4327>, and every thing that creepeth <WH7431> upon the earth <WH127> after his kind <WH4327>: and 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that it was good <WH2896>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let us make <WH6213> <WH8799> man <WH120> in our image <WH6754>, after our likeness <WH1823>: and let them have dominion <WH7287> <WH8799> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea <WH3220>, and over the fowl <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and over the cattle <WH929>, and over all the earth <WH776>, and over every creeping thing <WH7431> that creepeth <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776>.

So 'Elohim <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH8799> man <WH120> in his own image <WH6754>, in the image <WH6754> of 'Elohim <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH8804> he him; male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> created <WH1254> <WH8804> he them.

And 'Elohim <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> them, and 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Be fruitful <WH6509> <WH8798>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8798>, and replenish <WH4390> <WH8798> the earth <WH776>, and subdue it <WH3533> <WH8798>: and have dominion <WH7287> <WH8798> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea <WH3220>, and over the fowl <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and over every living thing <WH2416> that moveth <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold <WH2009>, I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> you every herb <WH6212> bearing <WH2232> <WH8802> seed <WH2233>, which is upon the face <WH6440> of all the earth <WH776>, and every tree <WH6086>, in the which is the fruit <WH6529> of a tree <WH6086> yielding <WH2232> <WH8802> seed <WH2233>; to you it shall be <WH1961> <WH8799> for meat <WH402>.

And to every beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>, and to every fowl <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and to every thing that creepeth <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776>, wherein there is life <WH2416> <WH5315>, I have given every green <WH3418> herb <WH6212> for meat <WH402>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> every thing that <WH834> he had made <WH6213> <WH8804>, and, behold, it was very <WH3966> good <WH2896>. And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were the sixth <WH8345> day <WH3117>.
